EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for PA Annual Review 1st Reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Addendum Annual Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual Review - {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Annual Review
Good Morning
Licence Record {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c} has a Partner Addendum due to expire in the next month.
Please review this PA and extend if needed.
Click here to view Partner Addendum.
Regards
